LINK: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... ragons-den

A game where your goal is to join a band of thieves but to do so you must be up for the challenge. Beware the dragon at the end.

So, I got carried away again. A small little project turned into something a bit larger. Go figure. This is definitely NOT my norm, so I stretched my imagination a lot with this one!

Anyway, give it a play if you would. It's pretty short and I think bug free, so I went ahead and made it public.

As always please report here any bugs or typos. Or, and this is new, if there are any major disruptions in the flow of the poetry due to wording/timing, fire away! Thanks a ton, now go have fun...

Happy Gaming.

XanMag
